text:
<@U68A3ASP9> i was exploring functions in CUDA and a call normcdf aborts julia directly
`CUDA.normcdf(1.0)`
```julia> CUDA.normcdf(1.0)
FATAL ERROR: Symbol "__nv_normcdf"not found
signal (6): Aborted
in expression starting at REPL[6]:1
raise at /lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (unknown line)
raise at /lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (unknown line)
Allocations: 13204160 (Pool: 13201587; Big: 2573); GC: 8
Aborted (core dumped)```
julia 1.6.-rc1
